tools.name: wigle
tools.description: Database of wireless networks with mapping and data.
examples: Search for Wi-Fi networks by location
tools.notes: Crowdsourced database of Wi-Fi networks.

tools.name: archive.org (Wayback Machine)
tools.description: Digital archive of the World Wide Web and other Internet information.
examples: Recover deleted content or forgotten information
tools.notes: Invaluable for historical web reconnaissance.

tools.name: google dorks
tools.description: Advanced search queries used to find hidden or exposed information on Google.
tools.notes: Powerful for uncovering sensitive data exposed online.

tools.name: yandex dorks
tools.description: Similar to Google dorks, but for the Yandex search engine.
tools.notes: Can reveal different results compared to Google.
links: No single link, use Yandex for dorking.

tools.name: bing dorks
tools.description: Advanced search queries for the Bing search engine.
tools.notes: Another alternative for broadening OSINT searches.
links: No single link, use Bing for dorking.

tools.name: crt.sh
tools.description: Certificate transparency log search tool to find SSL/TLS certificates and associated domains.
examples: Search for domains related to an organization
tools.notes: Excellent for passive subdomain enumeration.

tools.name: virustotal
tools.description: Service that analyzes suspicious files and URLs to detect malware and other threats.
examples: Check if a file is malicious
Get information about a URL's reputation
tools.notes: Can reveal passive information about infrastructure and associated threats.

tools.name: threatcrowd
tools.description: Tool for finding and analyzing attack surface of an organization.
examples: Discover associated domains, IPs, and email addresses
tools.notes: Maps out relationships between various internet-facing assets.

tools.name: urlscan.io
tools.description: Website scanner that generates a report of the site, including screenshots, network requests, and external links.
examples: Gather intelligence on website structure and dependencies
tools.notes: Provides detailed insights into website behavior.

tools.name: reconnaissance suite
tools.description: A hypothetical suite of tools combining various reconnaissance techniques.
examples: Automated external and internal network scans
tools.notes: Designed for streamlined reconnaissance in large environments.
